segments.text: Excuse me . Could you please tell me how to get to the nearest cinema ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Turn left at the second light . You can't miss it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will it take me long to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . It's not far at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all right . Have a good day .
segments.speaker: S2
